Introduction: Oh hi there. The name's Steve.#$b#New around here, I'm guessing?#$b#I have one rule. Don't ask about the bat I'm holding. Got it?$5
Mon: What's up, @? Got a quick question for you. Answer completely honestly.#$b#$q 6000/6001 mon_template#Does my hair look okay?#$r 6000 250 mon_yes#Is that even a question?#$r 6001 100 mon_no#Ew no.
Tue: I've been thinking about getting back into football. Alex better play with me from time to time.
